channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: Can Vols solve Swamp hex vs Florida football?
item.description: ATLANTA ― The last time Tennessee beatFlorida footballin The Swamp, George W. Bush was president, and The Matrix Reloaded topped the box office.

item.title: We must support survivors in Florida. The Diddy verdict…
item.description: The recent verdict in the high-profiletrial of Sean “Diddy” Combshas sent shockwaves through both the survivor community and the broader public.

item.title: Miami artist gets first solo show at Sarasota Art Museum
item.description: Chris Friday is a Miami-based, African American artist. “Where We Never Grow Old” at Sarasota Art Museum is her first solo museum exhibition. Her ageless realm exists on many levels in her site-specific installation, which is a loving celebration of the artist’s family. It’s also a memory palace of Friday’s cultural history. And a defiant refusal to see that history erased.

item.title: 'Good Trouble' anti-Trump protest map of Florida cities…
item.description: Last month,anti-Trump “No Kings” protestswere scheduled across the U.S. on Flag Day. Now, a similarnational day of action is being planned for tomorrow, July 17, with hundreds of events scheduled nationwide for the fifth anniversary of Congressman John Lewis death.

item.title: Sheriff Hoffman deserves support for keeping Sarasota County safe
item.description: I read the July 13 guest column – titled "Sarasota County loves to spend our money. It's time to draw the line." – by Martin Hyde. He made some important points regarding fiscal responsibility.
